An Investly is a basket of stocks that reflects an idea

Investly offers the experts designed portfolios of stocks or ETFs, that track a theme, strategy or financial goals

Diversify & lower your risks

Created by experts

Get Started
Discover Investly Portfolios

Start Investing Today

Frequently Asked Questions

Understanding Investly

What is a Investly

An Investly is a basket of exchange traded securities (like stocks & ETFs) in a specified weighting scheme to reflect a certain objective (ideas, themes, strategies). An Investly has a minimum of 2 securities and a maximum of 50 securities.

How is it different from stacks

Investing in a basket of stocks gives you diversification benefits that minimize stock-specific risk. Instead of picking stocks, you can invest in ideas you believe in with research-backed portfolios that are tied to relatable themes.

What are the fees involved

Investly do not charge any fee. However, Investly portfolio manager charge a small fee quarterly or annually. Portfolio manager fee could be flat fee or percentage of investment value. Standard brokerage charges may apply.

Investing in Investly

Which Investly should I invest in?

Investly work best when used for long-term investing. So ideally, you should be investing in a Investly portfolios whose theme/strategy you think will do well in long run. Additionally, you can use risk labels assigned to Investly to find one that suits your risk appetite.

How do I track my portfolios

When you invest in a Investly portfolio, the index value is set to 100 on the day of investment - this helps you track the total returns without having to monitor each stock. You can also use the performance metrics to get a more detailed understanding of your Investly portfolio.

Can I add or remove stocks myself

With Investly, you have complete flexiblity over your investments, so you can add or remove stocks anytime with the 'manage' option. However, please ensure that you don't sell any Investly portfolio stocks directly on the trading platform.

Are there any lock in periods

There are no lock-in periods, so you may sell your Investly stock or complete portfolio anytime. As a concept however, Investly works best when used for long-term investing.

Do's and Don'ts

Start an SIP to invest periodicaly

Once you have invested in a Investly portfolio, you can safeguard your investments from market volatility by starting SIP to invest more regularly. When your SIP instalment is due, you can confirm investing more in 2 clicks.

Rebalance your Investly regularly

Rebalancing is the process of ensuring the stocks & weights of the Investly continue to be true to the underlying idea/strategy. You can apply rebalance updates to your Investly in 2 clicks to ensure it is on track with the strategy.

Do not shell stocks on broker platform

To ensure that your Investly constituents are in sync with your holdings, please refrain from selling Investly stocks on the trading platform. Any sell orders placed directly on the trading platform won't reflect in your Investly.

Don't let emotion drive investment decisions

You can assess how the theme that you have invested in is playing out and reap its benefits only when you stay invested for a long term. It's best to not base investment decisions on short-term fluctuations.
